# PhantomStream Badges

[![Go CI](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/phantom-stream/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/phantom-stream/actions/workflows/ci.yml)
[![CodeQL](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/phantom-stream/actions/workflows/codeql.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/phantom-stream/actions/workflows/codeql.yml)
[![Go Report Card](https://goreportcard.com/badge/github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/phantom-stream)](https://goreportcard.com/report/github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/phantom-stream)
[![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-yellow.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT)
[![Go Version](https://img.shields.io/badge/Go-1.24+-00ADD8?logo=go)](https://go.dev/doc/install)
[![Release](https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/YOUR_USERNAME/phantom-stream)](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/phantom-stream/releases)

将以上徽章添加到 README.md 的顶部，可以更好地展示项目的状态和质量。

## 可用的徽章

### 基础徽章
- **GitHub Actions CI** - 持续集成状态
- **CodeQL** - 安全代码扫描状态
- **Go Report Card** - Go 代码质量评分
- **License** - 项目许可协议
- **Go Version** - 支持的 Go 版本
- **Release** - 最新版本号

### 可选徽章

```markdown
[![codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/YOUR_USERNAME/phantom-stream/branch/main/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/YOUR_USERNAME/phantom-stream)
[![Downloads](https://img.shields.io/github/downloads/YOUR_USERNAME/phantom-stream/total.svg)](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/phantom-stream/releases)
[![Contributors](https://img.shields.io/github/contributors/YOUR_USERNAME/phantom-stream.svg)](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/phantom-stream/graphs/contributors)
[![Issues](https://img.shields.io/github/issues/YOUR_USERNAME/phantom-stream.svg)](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/phantom-stream/issues)
[![Pull Requests](https://img.shields.io/github/issues-pr/YOUR_USERNAME/phantom-stream.svg)](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/phantom-stream/pulls)
```

## 使用方法

将以下代码添加到 `README.md` 文件的顶部（标题之后）：

```markdown
# PhantomStream - PDF 动态追踪与防护系统

[![Go CI](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/phantom-stream/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/phantom-stream/actions/workflows/ci.yml)
[![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-yellow.svg)](LICENSE)
[![Go Version](https://img.shields.io/badge/Go-1.24+-00ADD8?logo=go)](https://go.dev/doc/install)

...（其余内容）
```

记得将 `YOUR_USERNAME` 替换为您的 GitHub 用户名。
